alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 9:22PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland and northwestern Virginia from east of the Allegheny Highlands to the Blue Ridge Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 AM Saturday to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Several power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest winds tonight will likely be at elevations above 2500 feet, with stronger winds reaching the lower elevations Saturday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Prepare for power outages.
